storyInfo: With the Doctor's help, Arctosz regathers the situation, while Ratatos hands commanding rights over to her younger sister.

attributes.content: Sigh!
attributes.name: Elder A

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Elder B

attributes.content: The 'Tschäggättäs' aren't letting us leave.
attributes.name: Elder A

attributes.content: They said Enciodes instructed them to make sure we stay here, supposedly for our own safety.
attributes.name: Elder A

attributes.content: See? This is exactly as I said. He is trying to lock us in here!
attributes.name: Elder B

attributes.content: The Great Elder is unconscious, the Saintess is yet to be coronated, and he insists the other two clans are traitors. The way I see it, he is definitely up to no good.
attributes.name: Elder A

attributes.content: Shh... *Sigh*... Talking about this is not going to do us any good. The Great Elder has always been in charge of the Court's affairs, and now that this has come to pass... What are we supposed to do?
attributes.name: Elder B

attributes.content: Is this all Kjeragandr's will...?
attributes.name: Elder C

attributes.content: It's difficult to say whether this is what Kjeragandr wanted, but I'm sure it will pain Her heart to see you so dejected.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: G-Great Saintess!
attributes.name: Elder A

attributes.content: We... We are simply worried...
attributes.name: Elder B

attributes.content: Is there something to worry about?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The Great Elder's condition... and the situation surrounding the clans...
attributes.name: Elder C

attributes.content: I just talked to the doctor. The Great Elder's outlook is not optimistic, but I'm sure Kjeragandr will have mercy on him given his leadership of the Vine-Bear Court for so many years. Have faith, the Great Elder will get better.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: In the interim, I will take charge of all of the Court's decisions, big and small.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Elder A

attributes.content: The Saintess was supposed take charge of Kjerag at the coronation, and the Great Elder has wanted to pass the baton to the Saintess for some time now. Given the extraordinary circumstances, what's stopping you?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Or do you elders have a better idea?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You're just the head maid...
attributes.name: Elder A

attributes.content: Enough. Head Maid Kjarr has the right of it.
attributes.name: Elder B

attributes.content: We've always had faith in the Saintess's ability, and she is willing to step forward to calm the masses. There is no better arrangement.
attributes.name: Elder B

attributes.content: You needn't worry, dear elders.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Considering what had happened at the ceremony, Enciodes indeed had a reason to do as he did.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: And even if Enciodes harbored ill intentions, as long as I'm here, the Vine-Bear Court will be safe.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Before, the Saintess's presence on the Holy Hunt's grounds, although brilliant, was only eye-catching.
But now, the Saintess radiates a certain aura that makes her impossible to defy.
The elders look at each other, before lowering their heads to her.
'As you wish, Saintess.'
Leave us, please.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Enya, you were incredible.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Really. I thought you'd be disappointed after you came back from the ceremony.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Looks like I was worrying too much.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I'm disappointed alright.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But the last time I was disappointed, I couldn't say anything.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Back then, I had no way to fight for myself.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: This time, even though I'm disappointed, I know that I have the power to make a change, no matter how little.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: So I don't want to be left disappointed this time. I need to do something to stave off my disappointment.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Enya... You've grown up.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I wish I could've stayed a child forever. Thinking about these things all day is just too much effort...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But you're right. I've grown up.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Faith...
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: *Cough*...
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Great Elder, you're awake!
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: Quiet down.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Quieting.
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: The ceremony... *cough*... What became of it? I... I remember interrogating the Browntail subject, but no more...
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: You were poisoned by Sir Arctosz. Then, Gnosis's appearance made things all the more complicated.
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: In the end, Sir Arctosz and Matriarch Ratatos joined hands to take on Sir Enciodes, only for him to overwhelm them...
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: That's not what I wanted to hear.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: What about the coronation ceremony? The Saintess? The transfer of powers?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: The ceremony was cancelled... Sir Enciodes announced that it will resume once the Paleroches and the Browntails are dealt with.
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: Enciodes... *cough*...
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Where's the Saintess?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: She... She is in her room right now.
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: Little one, how does it feel to sit in a Tri-Clan Council meeting for the first time?
Great Elder... I never imagined that... the Tri-Clan Council's meetings would be so boring.

The clan leaders only talked about things that concerned their families. Every time they talk about which family will put in more effort in the annual events, they aren't interested at all. They don't care about Kjeragandr.
Hohoh, a smart one. I was right about you.
Great Elder... Did you show me this on purpose?
That's right.
Why?
Because you will one day become the Great Elder.
Then, you'll understand just what this so-called faith stands for.
You... How long has it been since you came to the Vine-Bear Court?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Huh? 25 years, Great Elder.
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: In those 25 years... *cough*... how do you think the Vine-Bear Court and Kjerag have changed?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: I... Aside from all that the Silverashes brought us, I do not think there has been any significant change.
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: These lands have not changed for a millennium.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: The future ought to see no change either.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: *Cough*... Help me up.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: But, Great Elder, your health...
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: I know my health... *cough*... better than anybody else.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: I don't have much time left.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: Have the Saintess proceed to the great hall. Tell her... I must speak to her about something.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Doctor, this is the second time you've saved my rear.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I've had a problem with Enciodes ever since he came back to Kjerag and established that Karlan Trade of his.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'm sure you saw it yourself when you entered Kjerag, his trade port. I can't begin to make heads or tails of it.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I've used the things he brought in. They're handy. My men are using them too. I know that.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The youths working for me think I don't know what they say about him. Well, I do.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But he can't keep things going like this. He's going to drive Kjerag further and further into this fire pit.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Kjeragandr is watching from above. If we go down that path, Kjerag will be punished.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: That's why I've always been the first one to stand up against him, and this is what that got me.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The Paleroches are no fans of trickery.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: And I had Valais by my side, but now...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Can I trust you?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Doctor, Ratatos is here.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Arctosz? I thought a hotheaded punk like you would've led your forces to take on Enciodes right about now.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: If it wasn't for the Doctor stopping me, that's what I would be doing right now.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You're... the Doctor... from Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You saved my life. Normally, I should be rewarding you somehow.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: But if what you want is the house of Browntail, then I'm sorry to disappoint you.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.options: Your help is absolutely vital.;(Adjust her collar for her);You're overthinking it. I'm not a bad guy.

attributes.content: Well, that's about the most pleasing thing I've heard the past couple days.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You and I have never met, and yet you did all that to stoke the fire. Tell me, how am I supposed to not overthink it?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Well, whatever.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: If Arctosz's here, I don't even have to guess at what it is that you want.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I'll be honest with you. Before your guy here found me, I was seriously thinking about surrendering to Enciodes.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Are you sure I can help you?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.options: If Arctosz is willing to surrender too, then I guess I don't need your help.

attributes.content: The Paleroches will never surrender.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: So...? What do you people want?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.options: First off, you have already lost.;First off, I can't help you win this battle.

attributes.content: You don't have to spell it out to me like that.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: The people are on Enciodes's side. When the ceremony ended, he even proclaimed that the 'crimes' are mine and Arctosz's alone and didn't do a thing to our territory.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: He's decided Kjerag is already his.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: And that's actually how things are.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Doctor, you're a smart one. What else can we do?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.options: The best way we have to get ourselves out of this hole is to save the Saintess.

attributes.content: You're right that only the Saintess can set things right.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: And Enciodes's taken control of the Vine-Bear Court so that the Saintess can't say anything.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Now here's the problem—He definitely sees you coming.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Actually, he probably has all those men guarding the place so that you can walk right into the trap.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.options: We can't go in through the front door, of course.;We'll need some preparation.

attributes.content: They'll help the Saintess?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: There's a reason that Enciodes isn't mounting an attack on the other enemies.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: First, he doesn't think it's necessary.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Second, he is worried that the Doctor will help the Paleroches.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The Doctor... If the Doctor's actually helping Arctosz, things are probably going to get out of hand.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: This Doctor isn't taking charge of Arctosz's army to fight us, though.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: From what you have told me, this Doctor wants to stop Arctosz from being the reckless man he is and launching an all-out war. Considering that, it's not likely there will be any direct confrontation that leads to bloodshed.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I don't exactly believe in this possibility, however. The way I see it, it's not out of the question that this Doctor is trying to take control of the Paleroches and the Browntails, seeking to become Kjerag's new overlord.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The Doctor's not that kind of person.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Right. The Doctor certainly could do it, though.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: I must say I'm a little flabbergasted by the appraisal that you two and Enciodes have of this person.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I can only hope you are right in that judgment.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: In any case, however things end up, it's very likely that they are aiming for Mount Karlan, which is under our control, of course.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: They'll need the Saintess to turn the tide of public opinion.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: And if they succeed in getting the Saintess out of Mount Karlan, then all that Enciodes has done will be for naught.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Naturally, the Doctor knows that.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: That's why we will see this Doctor here.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: It's ironic. In their eyes, we Silverashes are taking our own family heiress hostage.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: They aren't wrong. Enya Silverash is indeed our hostage right now.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: If you would rather I use a different turn of phrase, the Saintess has become our most important bargaining chip.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: That doesn't change anything, however.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Gnosis... could you please stop provoking Matterhorn?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: I'm helping you two face reality.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Or are you trying to tell me that you two didn't know that Enciodes had his eyes on more than just the transfer of powers?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: It was never his plan to let faith govern the state.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: That's not to say anything negative about Enya Silverash.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I'm not interested in her at all. Naturally, I don't have any opinion about her.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: But she became the Saintess, and she's done very well.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: In that case, she will no doubt be an obstacle to Enciodes. That's all. And now things have come to this, we cannot permit anyone else on this stage to do any better than the head of the Silverash family.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I know that...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Of course I know that.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: This isn't a game. There are no do-overs. Let's not give ourselves any unnecessary trouble.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Monch, you're in charge of surveillance.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: On it.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Good. This plan is perfect!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You sure about that...?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: On the surface, we're sending our forces to raze the place to the ground, making it look like we're there to save Yucatan and attract their attention that way, to confuse them about your real plans.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You want the main force to attack them from the front.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: That's to let Arctosz's forces get near Mount Karlan. Your guys will also be there in the mountains to help them along.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Doesn't sound like the safest plan there is, but it seems feasible.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What about Degenbrecher? Even if you can deal with Enciodes's Tschäggättä performers, if you don't have a way to take care of that actual monster, you'll never be able to get to him.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Is this part of my job too?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: You make that sound simple, but are you sure about this?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I wouldn't say sure. But I can probably keep her busy for some ten minutes.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: You're a monster yourself, huh...?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: So, Doctor of Rhodes Island. How are you so sure I'll help you?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.options: I'm not forcing you.;There isn't any part of this plan that has to involve you.

attributes.content: You know, you kind of remind me of Enciodes.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You told me all about your plan, and then you say don't absolutely need me.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: But I already know every last detail.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: No one would let somebody who knows so much just walk away.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Whatever...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I'll go in your place.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Sciurus, this isn't a game.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Why don't you take a look in the mirror before you say that crap, Ratatos?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: You're exhausted, you look pale as a ghost. Hell, you look completely out of it.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: How am I supposed to relax when I have someone like you there to save my husband?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I don't know what you and Enciodes talked about in that room.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: But I'm not going to watch you hand the Browntail family over to him!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Why are you staring at me like that? You want a fight?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: You might just be right.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Fine, Doctor of Rhodes Island. Sciurus will help you with your plan in my place.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Though, to tell you the truth, I'm not holding out hope that we can get anything back from Enciodes.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: All I can say is: good luck.
attributes.name: Ratatos
